AboutUsPage.heroSubtitle: Connecting believers with churches and events across Nigeria
AboutUsPage.missionText1: ChurchFinder was born out of a desire to make it easier for Christians to find churches and events in their local communities. We believe that every believer should have access to a vibrant faith community.
AboutUsPage.missionText2: Our platform serves as a bridge between churches and individuals looking for spiritual homes, events, and fellowship opportunities across Nigeria.
AboutUsPage.founderBio: Sam Proclim created ChurchFinder with a passion for connecting believers with their spiritual communities. With years of experience in ministry and technology, he envisioned a platform that would make it easier for people to find churches and events that align with their faith.
